function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation and air circulation in car parking buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and poor air quality","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation systems and air purification technology","Technologies":"Air purification systems, mechanical ventilation","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene facilities in car parking buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide adequate sanitation facilities, promote hygiene best practices","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, hand hygiene stations","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility operators"},{"Description":"Lack of effective safety and security measures in car parking buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of criminal activity and personal safety concerns","Mitigation":"Implement security cameras, lighting, and emergency communication systems","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, access control, emergency communication devices","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, security personnel"}]}
